headlines.headline: 'The Hoop Collective': Episodes of Brian Windhorst's NBA podcast
headlines.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

headlines.headline: Kyrie Irving to miss rest of season, eyes return for 2026-27
headlines.description: Mavericks star Kyrie Irving will miss the remainder of the season as he continues to recover from knee surgery last March.

headlines.headline: Are Celtics No. 1 in the East if Jayson Tatum returns this season?
headlines.description: Alan Hahn says it's unfair to put high expectations on Jayson Tatum should he return for the Celtics this season.

headlines.headline: Generation Jalen: How one name dominates the NBA like few before
headlines.description: The Jalens (and Jaylens, Jaylins and Jaylons) are running the modern NBA -- but could they beat some of the all-time greats if they teamed up?

headlines.headline: How the sports memorabilia industry tries to stay ahead of fraud
headlines.description: Sports memorabilia and collectibles companies are monitoring for fraudsters and shifting authentication tactics.

headlines.headline: Chicago hosts Toronto on home skid
headlines.description: Toronto Raptors (32-23, fifth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Chicago Bulls (24-31, 11th in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Team USA's Knight, Bowe get engaged at the Olympics
headlines.description: Knight and Bowe fell in love at the 2022 Games in Beijing and have brought their Olympic love story full circle.

headlines.headline: Where should Chiefs look to improve with savings from Mahomes' restructuring?
headlines.description: Louis Riddick and Kimberley A. Martin examine where the Chiefs should look to improve with the cap space provided by Patrick Mahomes' restructured contract.

headlines.headline: Riddick on Kyler Murray: Ability isnâ€™t the issue, commitment and leadership are
headlines.description: Louis Riddick breaks down why some teams in the NFL might have reservations over acquiring Kyler Murray.

headlines.headline: Chiefs restructure Patrick Mahomes' deal, create cap space
headlines.description: The Chiefs restructured Patrick Mahomes' contract this week, creating much-needed salary cap space ahead of the 2026 season, according to ESPN and multiple reports.

headlines.headline: Is Daniel Jones worthy of an extension with the Colts?
headlines.description: Louis Riddick and Mike Tannenbaum question whether if Daniel Jones has done enough to earn a contract extension from the Colts.

headlines.headline: Sources: Northern Illinois' Hammock to Seahawks as RB coach
headlines.description: Northern Illinois coach Thomas Hammock has accepted a job offer to become the next running backs coach/senior offensive assistant for the Seattle Seahawks, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Olympics 2026 men's hockey: Standings, stats, schedule, more
headlines.description: Find the full schedule, scoring and goaltending leaders and knockout round bracket here.

headlines.headline: How NHL GMs are handling the 2026 Olympic break
headlines.description: We spoke to execs around the league to learn what they're up to while many players are in Milan Cortina.

headlines.headline: How the sports memorabilia industry tries to stay ahead of fraud
headlines.description: Sports memorabilia and collectibles companies are monitoring for fraudsters and shifting authentication tactics.

headlines.headline: Picks for the 2026 Olympic men's hockey medal round bracket
headlines.description: As the knockout round rolls, here's how the bracket will play out -- including a star-filled final.

headlines.headline: Sweden to face U.S. in men's hockey quarterfinals at Olympics
headlines.description: Sweden avoided an early exit in this year's Winter Olympics, beating Latvia 5-1 to set up a quarterfinal matchup vs. the United States.

headlines.headline: Jeff Skinner clears waivers after Sharks waive vet forward
headlines.description: Veteran forward Jeff Skinner cleared waivers Tuesday after the San Jose Sharks waived him the day before.
